pr_title: Add more error message for Presto-on-Spark

timeline.message: Add more error message for Presto-on-Spark

timeline.body:
@arhimondr : OSS Spark use "Executor heartbeat timed out". However, when fb-spark backports https://github.com/apache/spark/commit/b5c35d68e430d6ebf92aff9f75f730ca14a68469. they use a slightly different exception message "Unable to talk to the executor". 

But seems both are quite self-explained, I feel no hurt to use both of them.
